description:
Keyboard Basics is designed for the beginning musician. This course provides the building blocks for a successful musical experience once the concepts are applied. The information can be applied to any genre of music thus making the material universal.

In this course you will learn the following:

  1. Note Names (Black Keys & White Keys)
  2. Sharps & Flats
  3. Scales
  4. Chords
  5. Reading Chorded Sheet Music

Every video can be downloaded for offline viewing.

Remember - Prov 27:17 "Iron Sharpens Iron"
title: Keyboard Basics
